message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. It's a one-of-a-kind item that I think you'll really love. I'm willing to sell it to you for $110. It's a great deal, if I do say so myself!
Hi Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I was hoping to find a price closer to my budget. Could we discuss a price around $95?

Hi Bob, I understand that $110 might be a bit steep for you, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. I can offer you a price of $105. It's a great compromise that still reflects the value of the product, and I think you'll really enjoy it!
